kpi_info.title: CS CALL TERMINATIONS DURING RE-ESTABLISHMENT
kpi_info.use: The number of CS voice calls terminated during RRC connection re-establishment procedure. This counter can be used to analyze the cases where the user terminates the call because it becomes mute for a while during re-establishment, and thus the user experiences a drop even if the call could recover soon after that. UPDATED: When the RNC receives RANAP: IU RELEASE COMMAND or RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT REQUEST requesting to release CS RAB while the RNC is waiting for RRC connection re-establishment to happen.
